anya-e0102n9:2_0: 737. Aṭṭhannaṁ pana ñāṇānaṁ vasena sikhāppattā vipassanā, navamañca saccānulomikañāṇanti
anya-e0102n9:2_1: ayaṁ paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma. Aṭṭhannanti cettha upakkilesavimuttaṁ vīthipaṭipannavipassanāsaṅkhātaṁ
anya-e0102n9:2_4: imāni aṭṭha ñāṇāni veditabbāni. Navamaṁ saccānulomikañāṇanti anulomassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:2_5: Tasmā taṁ sampādetukāmena upakkilesavimuttaṁ udayabbayañāṇaṁ ādiṁ katvā etesu ñāṇesu yogo karaṇīyo.
anya-e0102n9:3_0: 738. Puna udayabbayañāṇe yogo kimatthiyoti ce? Lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇattho. Udayabbayañāṇaṁ
anya-e0102n9:3_1: hi heṭṭhā dasahi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṁ hutvā yāthāvasarasato tilakkhaṇaṁ sallakkhetuṁ
anya-e0102n9:3_2: nāsakkhi. Upakkilesavimuttaṁ pana sakkoti. Tasmā lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇatthamettha puna yogo karaṇīyo.
anya-e0102n9:4_0: 739. Lakkhaṇāni pana kissa amanasikārā kena paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhahanti? Aniccalakkhaṇaṁ
anya-e0102n9:4_1: tāva udayabbayānaṁ amanasikārā santatiyā paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti. Dukkhalakkhaṇaṁ
anya-e0102n9:4_2: abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanassa amanasikārā iriyāpathehi paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti. Anattalakkhaṇaṁ
anya-e0102n9:4_3: nānādhātuvinibbhogassa amanasikārā ghanena paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti. Udayabbayampana
anya-e0102n9:4_4: pariggahetvā santatiyā vikopitāya aniccalakkhaṇaṁ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti. Abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṁ
anya-e0102n9:4_5: manasikatvā iriyāpathe ugghāṭite dukkhalakkhaṇaṁ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti. Nānādhātuyo
anya-e0102n9:4_6: vinibbhujitvā ghanavinibbhoge kate anattalakkhaṇaṁ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n9:5_0: 740. Ettha ca aniccaṁ, aniccalakkhaṇaṁ, dukkhaṁ, dukkhalakkhaṇaṁ, anattā, anattalakkhaṇanti
anya-e0102n9:5_1: ayaṁ vibhāgo veditabbo. Tattha aniccanti khandhapañcakaṁ. Kasmā? Uppādavayaññathattabhāvā
anya-e0102n9:5_2: , hutvā abhāvato vā. Uppādavayaññathattaṁ aniccalakkhaṇaṁ hutvā abhāvasaṅkhāto vā ākāravikāro.
anya-e0102n9:6: ‘‘Yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkha’’nti (saṁ. ni. 3.15) vacanato pana tadeva khandhapañcakaṁ dukkhaṁ. Kasmā? Abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanā, abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanākāro dukkhalakkhaṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:7: ‘‘Yaṁ dukkhaṁ tadanattā’’ti (saṁ. ni. 3.15) pana vacanato tadeva khandhapañcakaṁ anattā. Kasmā? Avasavattanato, avasavattanākāro anattalakkhaṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:8: Tayidaṁ sabbampi ayaṁ yogāvacaro upakkilesavimuttena vīthipaṭipannavipassanāsaṅkhātena udayabbayānupassanāñāṇena yāthāvasarasato sallakkheti.
anya-e0102n9:11_1: tulayato tīrayato taṁ ñāṇaṁ tikkhaṁ hutvā vahati, saṅkhārā lahuṁ upaṭṭhahanti, ñāṇe
anya-e0102n9:11_2: tikkhe vahante saṅkhāresu lahuṁ upaṭṭhahantesu uppādaṁ vā ṭhitiṁ vā pavattaṁ vā nimittaṁ
anya-e0102n9:11_3: vā na sampāpuṇāti. Khayavayabhedanirodheyeva sati santiṭṭhati. Tassa ‘‘evaṁ uppajjitvā
anya-e0102n9:11_4: evaṁ nāma saṅkhāragataṁ nirujjhatī’’ti passato etasmiṁ ṭhāne bhaṅgānupassanaṁ nāma
anya-e0102n9:12_0: ‘‘Kathaṁ ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā bhaṅgānupassane paññā vipassane ñāṇaṁ? Rūpārammaṇatā
anya-e0102n9:12_1: cittaṁ uppajjitvā bhijjati, taṁ ārammaṇaṁ paṭisaṅkhā tassa cittassa bhaṅgaṁ anupassati
anya-e0102n9:12_2: . Anupassatīti kathaṁ anupassati? Aniccato anupassati no niccato, dukkhato anupassati
anya-e0102n9:12_3: no sukhato, anattato anupassati no attato, nibbindati no nandati, virajjati no rajjati,
anya-e0102n9:12_4: nirodheti no samudeti, paṭinissajjati no ādiyati.
anya-e0102n9:13_0: ‘‘Aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṁ pajahati. Dukkhato anupassanto sukhasaññaṁ, anattato
anya-e0102n9:13_1: anupassanto attasaññaṁ, nibbindanto nandiṁ, virajjanto rāgaṁ, nirodhento samudayaṁ
anya-e0102n9:14: ‘‘Vedanārammaṇatā…pe… saññārammaṇatā… saṅkhārārammaṇatā… viññāṇārammaṇatā… cakkhārammaṇatā…pe… jarāmaraṇārammaṇatā cittaṁ uppajjitvā bhijjati…pe… paṭinissajjanto ādānaṁ pajahati.
anya-e0102n9:22: Tayo upaṭṭhāne kusalatā, nānādiṭṭhīsu na kampatī’’ti.
anya-e0102n9:23: ‘‘Taṁ ñātaṭṭhena ñāṇaṁ, pajānanaṭṭhena paññā, tena vuccati ‘ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā bhaṅgānupassane paññā vipassane ñāṇa’’’nti (paṭi. ma. 1.51-52).
anya-e0102n9:24_0: 742. Tattha ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhāti yaṁkiñci ārammaṇaṁ paṭisaṅkhāya jānitvā, khayato
anya-e0102n9:24_1: vayato disvāti attho. Bhaṅgānupassane paññāti tassa, ārammaṇaṁ khayato vayato paṭisaṅkhāya
anya-e0102n9:24_2: uppannassa ñāṇassa bhaṅgaṁ anupassane yā paññā, idaṁ vipassane ñāṇanti vuttaṁ. Taṁ
anya-e0102n9:24_3: kathaṁ hotīti ayaṁ tāva kathetukamyatāpucchāya attho. Tato yathā taṁ hoti, taṁ dassetuṁ
anya-e0102n9:25_0: Tattha rūpārammaṇatā cittaṁ uppajjitvā bhijjatīti rūpārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ uppajjitvā
anya-e0102n9:25_1: bhijjati. Atha vā rūpārammaṇabhāve cittaṁ uppajjitvā bhijjatīti attho. Taṁ ārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0102n9:25_2: paṭisaṅkhāti taṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ paṭisaṅkhāya jānitvā, khayato vayato disvāti attho.
anya-e0102n9:25_3: Tassa cittassa bhaṅgaṁ anupassatīti yena cittena taṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ khayato vayato
anya-e0102n9:25_4: diṭṭhaṁ, tassa cittassa aparena cittena bhaṅgaṁ anupassatīti attho. Tenāhu porāṇā
anya-e0102n9:26: Ettha ca anupassatīti anu anu passati, anekehi ākārehi punappunaṁ passatīti attho. Tenāha – ‘‘anupassatīti kathaṁ anupassati. Aniccato anupassatī’’tiādi.
anya-e0102n9:27_0: Tattha yasmā bhaṅgo nāma aniccatāya paramā koṭi, tasmā so bhaṅgānupassako yogāvacaro
anya-e0102n9:27_1: sabbaṁ saṅkhāragataṁ aniccato anupassati, no niccato. Tato aniccassa dukkhattā, dukkhassa
anya-e0102n9:27_2: ca anattattā tadeva dukkhato anupassati, no sukhato. Anattato anupassati no attato.
anya-e0102n9:28_0: Yasmā pana yaṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā, na taṁ abhinanditabbaṁ. Yañca anabhinanditabbaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:28_1: na tattha rajjitabbaṁ. Tasmā etasmiṁ bhaṅgānupassanānusārena ‘‘aniccaṁ dukkhamanattā’’ti
anya-e0102n9:28_2: diṭṭhe saṅkhāragate nibbindati, no nandati. Virajjati, no rajjati. So evaṁ arajjanto
anya-e0102n9:28_3: lokikeneva tāva ñāṇena rāgaṁ nirodheti, no samudeti. Samudayaṁ na karotīti attho.
anya-e0102n9:29_0: Atha vā so evaṁ viratto yathā diṭṭhaṁ saṅkhāragataṁ, tathā adiṭṭhampi anvayañāṇavasena
anya-e0102n9:29_1: nirodheti , no samudeti. Nirodhatova manasikaroti. Nirodhamevassa passati, no samudayanti attho.
anya-e0102n9:30_0: So evaṁ paṭipanno paṭinissajjati, no ādiyati. Kiṁ vuttaṁ hoti? Ayampi aniccādianupassanā
anya-e0102n9:30_1: tadaṅgavasena saddhiṁ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilesānaṁ pariccajanato, saṅkhatadosadassanena
anya-e0102n9:30_2: ca tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo
anya-e0102n9:30_3: cāti vuccati. Tasmā tāya samannāgato bhikkhu yathāvuttena nayena kilese pariccajati,
anya-e0102n9:30_4: nibbāne ca pakkhandati. Nāpi nibbattanavasena kilese ādiyati, na adosadassitāvasena
anya-e0102n9:31_0: 743. Idānissa tehi ñāṇehi yesaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānaṁ hoti, taṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘aniccato anupassanto
anya-e0102n9:31_1: niccasaññaṁ pajahatī’’tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha nandinti sappītikaṁ taṇhaṁ. Sesaṁ vuttanayameva.
anya-e0102n9:32_0: 744. Gāthāsu pana vatthusaṅkamanāti rūpassa bhaṅgaṁ disvā puna yena cittena bhaṅgo
anya-e0102n9:32_1: diṭṭho, tassāpi bhaṅgadassanavasena purimavatthuto aññavatthusaṅkamanā. Paññāya ca
anya-e0102n9:32_2: vivaṭṭanāti udayaṁ pahāya vaye santiṭṭhanā. Āvajjanābalañcevāti rūpassa bhaṅgaṁ disvā
anya-e0102n9:32_3: puna bhaṅgārammaṇassa cittassa bhaṅgadassanatthaṁ anantarameva āvajjanasamatthatā.
anya-e0102n9:33_0: 745.Ārammaṇaanvayena ubho ekavavatthanāti paccakkhato diṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa anvayena
anya-e0102n9:33_1: anugamanena yathā idaṁ, tathā atītepi saṅkhāragataṁ bhijjittha, anāgatepi bhijjissatīti
anya-e0102n9:39_0: Nirodhe adhimuttatāti evaṁ ubhinnaṁ bhaṅgavasena ekavavatthānaṁ katvā tasmiññeva
anya-e0102n9:39_1: bhaṅgasaṅkhāte nirodhe adhimuttatā taggarutā tanninnatā tappoṇatā tappabbhāratāti
anya-e0102n9:39_2: attho. Vayalakkhaṇavipassanāti esā vayalakkhaṇavipassanā nāmāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n9:40_0: 746.Ārammaṇañca paṭisaṅkhāti purimañca rūpādiārammaṇaṁ jānitvā. Bhaṅgañca anupassatīti
anya-e0102n9:40_1: tassārammaṇassa bhaṅgaṁ disvā tadārammaṇassa cittassa bhaṅgaṁ anupassati. Suññato
anya-e0102n9:40_2: ca upaṭṭhānanti tassevaṁ bhaṅgaṁ anupassato ‘‘saṅkhārāva bhijjanti, tesaṁ bhedo maraṇaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:40_3: na añño koci atthī’’ti suññato upaṭṭhānaṁ ijjhati.
anya-e0102n9:46: Adhipaññāvipassanāti yā ca ārammaṇapaṭisaṅkhā yā ca bhaṅgānupassanā yañca suññato upaṭṭhānaṁ, ayaṁ adhipaññāvipassanā nāmāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n9:47_0: 747.Kusalo tīsu anupassanāsūti aniccānupassanādīsu tīsu cheko bhikkhu. Catasso ca
anya-e0102n9:47_1: vipassanāsūti nibbidādīsu ca catūsu vipassanāsu. Tayo upaṭṭhāne kusalatāti khayato
anya-e0102n9:47_2: vayato suññatoti imasmiñca tividhe upaṭṭhāne kusalatāya. Nānādiṭṭhīsu na kampatīti
anya-e0102n9:48_0: 748. So evaṁ avedhamāno ‘‘aniruddhameva nirujjhati, abhinnameva bhijjatī’’ti pavattamanasikāro
anya-e0102n9:48_1: dubbalabhājanassa viya bhijjamānassa, sukhumarajasseva vippakiriyamānassa, tilānaṁ
anya-e0102n9:48_2: viya bhajjiyamānānaṁ sabbasaṅkhārānaṁ uppādaṭṭhitipavattanimittaṁ vissajjetvā bhedameva
anya-e0102n9:48_3: passati. So yathā nāma cakkhumā puriso pokkharaṇītīre vā nadītīre vā ṭhito thūlaphusitake
anya-e0102n9:48_4: deve vassante udakapiṭṭhe mahantamahantāni udakabubbuḷakāni uppajjitvā uppajjitvā
anya-e0102n9:48_5: sīghaṁ sīghaṁ bhijjamānāni passeyya, evameva sabbe saṅkhārā bhijjanti bhijjantīti
anya-e0102n9:48_6: passati. Evarūpaṁ hi yogāvacaraṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ bhagavatā –
anya-e0102n9:50: Evaṁ lokaṁ avekkhantaṁ, maccurājā na passatī’’ti. (dha. pa. 170);
anya-e0102n9:51_0: 749. Tassevaṁ ‘‘sabbe saṅkhārā bhijjanti bhijjantī’’ti abhiṇhaṁ passato aṭṭhānisaṁsaparivāraṁ
anya-e0102n9:51_1: bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇaṁ balappattaṁ hoti. Tatrime aṭṭhānisaṁsā – bhavadiṭṭhippahānaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:59_3: viya mahābhayaṁ hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. Tassa ‘‘atītā saṅkhārā niruddhā, paccuppannā
anya-e0102n9:59_4: nirujjhanti, anāgate nibbattanakasaṅkhārāpi evameva nirujjhissantī’’ti passato etasmiṁ
anya-e0102n9:60_0: Tatrāyaṁ upamā – ekissā kira itthiyā tayo puttā rājaparādhikā, tesaṁ rājā sīsacchedaṁ
anya-e0102n9:60_1: āṇāpesi. Sā puttehi saddhiṁ āghātanaṁ agamāsi. Athassā jeṭṭhaputtassa sīsaṁ chinditvā
anya-e0102n9:60_2: majjhimassa chindituṁ ārabhiṁsu. Sā jeṭṭhassa sīsaṁ chinnaṁ majjhimassa ca chijjamānaṁ
anya-e0102n9:60_3: disvā kaniṭṭhamhi ālayaṁ vissajji ‘‘ayampi etesaññeva sadiso bhavissatī’’ti. Tattha
anya-e0102n9:60_4: tassā itthiyā jeṭṭhaputtassa chinnasīsadassanaṁ viya yogino atītasaṅkhārānaṁ nirodhadassanaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:60_6: etesaññeva sadiso bhavissatī’’ti kaniṭṭhaputtamhi ālayavissajjanaṁ viya ‘‘anāgatepi
anya-e0102n9:60_7: nibbattanakasaṅkhārā bhijjissantī’’ti anāgatānaṁ nirodhadassanaṁ. Tassevaṁ passato
anya-e0102n9:61_0: Aparāpi upamā – ekā kira pūtipajā itthī dasa dārake vijāyi. Tesu nava matā, eko hatthagato
anya-e0102n9:61_1: marati, aparo kucchiyaṁ. Sā nava dārake mate dasamañca mīyamānaṁ disvā kucchigate
anya-e0102n9:61_2: ālayaṁ vissajji ‘‘ayampi etesaññeva sadiso bhavissatī’’ti. Tattha tassā itthiyā navannaṁ
anya-e0102n9:61_3: dārakānaṁ maraṇānussaraṇaṁ viya yogino atītasaṅkhārānaṁ nirodhadassanaṁ, hatthagatassa
anya-e0102n9:61_4: mīyamānabhāvadassanaṁ viya yogino paccuppannānaṁ nirodhadassanaṁ, kucchigate ālayavissajjanaṁ
anya-e0102n9:61_5: viya anāgatānaṁ nirodhadassanaṁ. Tassevaṁ passato etasmiṁ khaṇe uppajjati bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:62_0: 751. Bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṁ pana bhāyati na bhāyatīti? Na bhāyati. Tañhi atītā saṅkhārā
anya-e0102n9:62_1: niruddhā, paccuppannā nirujjhanti, anāgatā nirujjhissantīti tīraṇamattameva hoti.
anya-e0102n9:62_2: Tasmā yathā nāma cakkhumā puriso nagaradvāre tisso aṅgārakāsuyo olokayamāno sayaṁ
anya-e0102n9:62_3: na bhāyati, kevalaṁ hissa ‘‘ye ye ettha nipatissanti, sabbe anappakaṁ dukkhamanubhavissantī’’ti
anya-e0102n9:62_4: tīraṇamattameva hoti. Yathā vā pana cakkhumā puriso khadirasūlaṁ ayosūlaṁ suvaṇṇasūlanti
anya-e0102n9:62_5: paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitaṁ sūlattayaṁ olokayamāno sayaṁ na bhāyati, kevalaṁ hissa ‘‘ye ye
anya-e0102n9:62_6: imesu sūlesu nipatissanti, sabbe anappakaṁ dukkhamanubhavissantī’’ti tīraṇamattameva
anya-e0102n9:62_7: hoti, evameva bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṁ sayaṁ na bhāyati, kevalaṁ hissa aṅgārakāsuttayasadisesu,
anya-e0102n9:62_8: sūlattayasadisesu ca tīsu bhavesu ‘‘atītā saṅkhārā niruddhā, paccuppannā nirujjhanti,
anya-e0102n9:62_9: anāgatā nirujjhissantī’’ti tīraṇamattameva hoti. Yasmā panassa kevalaṁ sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitinivāsagatā
anya-e0102n9:62_10: saṅkhārā byasanāpannā sappaṭibhayā hutvā bhayato upaṭṭhahanti, tasmā bhayatupaṭṭhānanti vuccati.
anya-e0102n9:63: Evaṁ bhayato upaṭṭhāne panassa ayaṁ pāḷi –
anya-e0102n9:64_0: ‘‘Aniccato manasikaroto kiṁ bhayato upaṭṭhāti? Dukkhato. Anattato manasikaroto kiṁ
anya-e0102n9:64_1: bhayato upaṭṭhātīti? Aniccato manasikaroto nimittaṁ bhayato upaṭṭhāti. Dukkhato manasikaroto
anya-e0102n9:64_2: pavattaṁ bhayato upaṭṭhāti. Anattato manasikaroto nimittañca pavattañca bhayato upaṭṭhātī’’ti (paṭi. ma. 1.227).
anya-e0102n9:65_0: Tattha nimittanti saṅkhāranimittaṁ. Atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ saṅkhārānamevetaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:65_1: Aniccato manasikaronto hi saṅkhārānaṁ maraṇameva passati, tenassa nimittaṁ bhayato
anya-e0102n9:65_2: upaṭṭhāti. Pavattanti rūpārūpabhavapavatti. Dukkhato manasikaronto hi sukhasammatāyapi
anya-e0102n9:65_3: pavattiyā abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanabhāvameva passati, tenassa pavattaṁ bhayato upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n9:65_4: Anattato manasikaronto pana ubhayampetaṁ suññagāmaṁ viya marīcigandhabbanagarādīni
anya-e0102n9:65_5: viya ca rittaṁ tucchaṁ suññaṁ assāmikaṁ apariṇāyakaṁ passati. Tenassa nimittañca
anya-e0102n9:68_0: 752. Tassa taṁ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṁ āsevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsesu
anya-e0102n9:68_1: neva tāṇaṁ, na leṇaṁ, na gati, nappaṭisaraṇaṁ paññāyati. Sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitinivāsagatesu
anya-e0102n9:68_2: saṅkhāresu ekasaṅkhārepi patthanā vā parāmāso vā na hoti. Tayo bhavā vītaccikaṅgārapuṇṇaaṅgārakāsuyo
anya-e0102n9:68_3: viya, cattāro mahābhūtā ghoravisaāsīvisā viya, pañcakkhandhā ukkhittāsikavadhakā
anya-e0102n9:68_4: viya, cha ajjhattikāyatanāni suññagāmo viya, cha bāhirāyatanāni gāmaghātakacorā viya,
anya-e0102n9:68_5: satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, nava ca sattāvāsā ekādasahi aggīhi ādittā sampajjalitā sajotibhūtā
anya-e0102n9:68_6: viya ca, sabbe saṅkhārā gaṇḍabhūtā rogabhūtā sallabhūtā aghabhūtā ābādhabhūtā viya
anya-e0102n9:68_7: ca nirassādā nirasā mahāādīnavarāsibhūtā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0102n9:69_0: Kathaṁ? Sukhena jīvitukāmassa bhīrukapurisassa ramaṇīyākārasaṇṭhitampi savāḷakamiva
anya-e0102n9:69_1: vanagahanaṁ, sasaddūlā viya guhā, sagāharakkhasaṁ viya udakaṁ, samussitakhaggā viya
anya-e0102n9:69_2: paccatthikā, savisaṁ viya bhojanaṁ, sacoro viya maggo, ādittamiva agāraṁ, uyyuttasenā
anya-e0102n9:69_3: viya raṇabhūmi. Yathā hi so puriso etāni savāḷakavanagahanādīni āgamma bhīto saṁviggo
anya-e0102n9:69_4: lomahaṭṭhajāto samantato ādīnavameva passati, evamevāyaṁ yogāvacaro bhaṅgānupassanāvasena
anya-e0102n9:69_5: sabbasaṅkhāresu bhayato upaṭṭhitesu samantato nirasaṁ nirassādaṁ ādīnavameva passati.
anya-e0102n9:69_6: Tassevaṁ passato ādīnavañāṇaṁ nāma uppannaṁ hoti. Yaṁ sandhāya idaṁ vuttaṁ –
anya-e0102n9:70_0: ‘‘Kathaṁ bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṁ? Uppādo bhayanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā
anya-e0102n9:70_1: ādīnave ñāṇaṁ. Pavattaṁ bhayanti… nimittaṁ bhayanti… āyūhanā bhayanti… paṭisandhi
anya-e0102n9:70_2: bhayanti… gati bhayanti… nibbatti bhayanti… upapatti bhayanti… jāti bhayanti… jarā
anya-e0102n9:70_3: bhayanti… byādhi bhayanti… maraṇaṁ bhayanti… soko bhayanti… paridevo bhayanti… upāyāso
anya-e0102n9:70_4: bhayanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṁ. Anuppādo khemanti santipade ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:70_5: Appavattaṁ…pe… anupāyāso khemanti santipade ñāṇaṁ. Uppādo bhayaṁ, anuppādo khemanti
anya-e0102n9:70_6: santipade ñāṇaṁ. Pavattaṁ…pe… upāyāso bhayaṁ, anupāyāso khemanti santipade ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:71_0: ‘‘Uppādo dukkhanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṁ. Pavattaṁ…pe… upāyāso dukkhanti
anya-e0102n9:71_1: bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṁ. Anuppādo sukhanti santipade ñāṇaṁ. Appavattaṁ…pe…
anya-e0102n9:71_2: anupāyāso sukhanti santipade ñāṇaṁ. Uppādo dukkhaṁ, anuppādo sukhanti santipade ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:71_3: Pavattaṁ…pe… upāyāso dukkhaṁ, anupāyāso sukhanti santipade ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:72_0: ‘‘Uppādo sāmisanti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṁ. Pavattaṁ…pe… upāyāso sāmisanti
anya-e0102n9:72_1: bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṁ. Anuppādo nirāmisanti santipade ñāṇaṁ. Appavattaṁ…pe…
anya-e0102n9:72_2: anupāyāso nirāmisanti santipade ñāṇaṁ. Uppādo sāmisaṁ, anuppādo nirāmisanti santipade
anya-e0102n9:72_3: ñāṇaṁ. Pavattaṁ…pe… upāyāso sāmisaṁ, anupāyāso nirāmisanti santipade ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:73_0: Uppādo ‘‘saṅkhārāti bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṁ. Pavattaṁ…pe… upāyāso saṅkhārāti
anya-e0102n9:73_1: bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇaṁ. Anuppādo nibbānanti santipade ñāṇaṁ. Appavattaṁ…pe…
anya-e0102n9:73_2: anupāyāso nibbānanti santipade ñāṇaṁ. Uppādo saṅkhārā, anuppādo nibbānanti santipade
anya-e0102n9:73_3: ñāṇaṁ. Pavattaṁ…pe… upāyāso saṅkhārā, anupāyāso nibbānanti santipade ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:80: Dvinnaṁ ñāṇānaṁ kusalatā, nānādiṭṭhīsu na kampatī’’ti.
anya-e0102n9:81: ‘‘Taṁ ñātaṭṭhena ñāṇaṁ. Pajānanaṭṭhena paññā. Tena vuccati ‘‘bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇa’’nti (paṭi. ma. 1.53).
anya-e0102n9:82_0: 753. Tattha uppādoti purimakammapaccayā idha uppatti. Pavattanti tathā uppannassa
anya-e0102n9:82_1: pavatti. Nimittanti sabbampi saṅkhāranimittaṁ. Āyūhanāti āyatiṁ paṭisandhihetubhūtaṁ
anya-e0102n9:82_2: kammaṁ. Paṭisandhīti āyatiṁ uppatti. Gatīti yāya gatiyā sā paṭisandhi hoti. Nibbattīti
anya-e0102n9:82_3: khandhānaṁ nibbattanaṁ. Upapattīti ‘‘samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā’’ti (dha. sa.
anya-e0102n9:82_4: 1289, 1291) evaṁ vuttā vipākappavatti. Jātīti jarādīnaṁ paccayabhūtā bhavapaccayā
anya-e0102n9:82_5: jāti. Jarāmaraṇādayo pākaṭā eva. Ettha ca uppādādayo pañceva ādīnavañāṇassa vatthuvasena
anya-e0102n9:82_6: vuttā. Sesā tesaṁ vevacanavasena. Nibbatti jātīti idañhi dvayaṁ uppādassa ceva paṭisandhiyā
anya-e0102n9:82_7: ca vevacanaṁ. Gati upapattīti idaṁ dvayaṁ pavattassa. Jarādayo nimittassāti. Tenāha –
anya-e0102n9:84: Āyūhanaṁ paṭisandhiṁ, ñāṇaṁ ādīnave ida’’nti ca.
anya-e0102n9:86_0: Anuppādo khemanti santipade ñāṇantiādi pana ādīnavañāṇassa paṭipakkhañāṇadassanatthaṁ
anya-e0102n9:86_1: vuttaṁ. Bhayatupaṭṭhānena vā ādīnavaṁ disvā ubbiggahadayānaṁ abhayampi atthi khemaṁ
anya-e0102n9:86_2: nirādīnavanti assāsajananatthampi etaṁ vuttaṁ. Yasmā vā panassa uppādādayo bhayato
anya-e0102n9:86_3: sūpaṭṭhitā honti, tassa tappaṭipakkhaninnaṁ cittaṁ hoti, tasmā bhayatupaṭṭhānavasena
anya-e0102n9:87_0: Ettha ca yaṁ bhayaṁ, taṁ yasmā niyamato dukkhaṁ. Taṁ vaṭṭāmisalokāmisakilesāmisehi
anya-e0102n9:87_1: avippamuttattā sāmisameva. Yañca sāmisaṁ, taṁ saṅkhāramattameva. Tasmā ‘‘uppādo dukkhanti
anya-e0102n9:87_2: bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā ādīnave ñāṇa’’ntiādi vuttaṁ. Evaṁ santepi bhayākārena dukkhākārena
anya-e0102n9:87_3: sāmisākārenāti evaṁ ākāranānattato pavattivasenevettha nānattaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:88_0: Dasañāṇe pajānātīti ādīnavañāṇaṁ pajānanto uppādādivatthukāni pañca, anuppādādivatthukāni
anya-e0102n9:88_1: pañcāti dasa ñāṇāni pajānāti paṭivijjhati sacchikaroti. Dvinnaṁ ñāṇānaṁ kusalatāti
anya-e0102n9:88_2: ādīnavañāṇassa ceva santipadañāṇassa cāti imesaṁ dvinnaṁ kusalatāya. Nānādiṭṭhīsuna
anya-e0102n9:88_3: kampatīti paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānādivasena pavattāsu diṭṭhīsu na vedhati. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
anya-e0102n9:91: 754. So evaṁ sabbasaṅkhāre ādīnavato passanto sabbabhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsagate sabhedake saṅkhāragate nibbindati ukkaṇṭhati nābhiramati.
anya-e0102n9:92_0: Seyyathāpi nāma, cittakūṭapabbatapādābhirato suvaṇṇarājahaṁso asucimhi caṇḍālagāmadvāraāvāṭe
anya-e0102n9:92_1: nābhiramati, sattasu mahāsaresuyeva abhiramati, evameva ayampi yogīrājahaṁso suparidiṭṭhādīnave
anya-e0102n9:92_2: sabhedake saṅkhāragate nābhiramati. Bhāvanārāmatāya pana bhāvanāratiyā samannāgatattā
anya-e0102n9:93_0: Yathā ca suvaṇṇapañjare pakkhitto sīho migarājā nābhiramati, tiyojanasahassavitthate
anya-e0102n9:93_1: pana himavanteyeva ramati, evamayaṁ yogīsīho tividhe sugatibhavepi nābhiramati, tīsu
anya-e0102n9:94_0: Yathā ca sabbaseto sattapatiṭṭho iddhimā vehāsaṅgamo chaddanto nāgarājā nagaramajjhe
anya-e0102n9:94_1: nābhiramati, himavati chaddantadahagahaneyeva abhiramati, evamayaṁ yogīvaravāraṇo
anya-e0102n9:94_2: sabbasmimpi saṅkhāragate nābhiramati, anuppādo khemantiādinā nayena diṭṭhe santipadeyeva
anya-e0102n9:96: 755. Taṁ panetaṁ purimena ñāṇadvayena atthato ekaṁ. Tenāhu porāṇā –
anya-e0102n9:97_0: ‘‘Bhayatupaṭṭhānaṁ ekameva tīṇi nāmāni labhati, sabbasaṅkhāre bhayato addasāti bhayatupaṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0102n9:97_1: nāma jātaṁ. Tesuyeva saṅkhāresu ādīnavaṁ uppādetīti ādīnavānupassanā nāma jātaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:97_2: Tesuyeva saṅkhāresu nibbindamānaṁ uppannanti nibbidānupassanā nāma jāta’’nti.
anya-e0102n9:98: Pāḷiyampi vuttaṁ – ‘‘yā ca bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā, yañca ādīnave ñāṇaṁ, yā ca nibbidā, ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva nāna’’nti (paṭi. ma. 1.227).
anya-e0102n9:100_0: 756. Iminā pana nibbidāñāṇena imassa kulaputtassa nibbindantassa ukkaṇṭhantassa anabhiramantassa
anya-e0102n9:100_2: cittaṁ na sajjati, na laggati, na bajjhati, sabbasmā saṅkhāragatā muccitukāmaṁ nissaritukāmaṁ
anya-e0102n9:100_3: hoti. Yathā kiṁ? Yathā nāma jālabbhantaragato maccho, sappamukhagato maṇḍūko, pañjarapakkhitto
anya-e0102n9:100_4: vanakukkuṭo, daḷhapāsavasagato migo, ahituṇḍikahatthagato sappo, mahāpaṅkapakkhando
anya-e0102n9:100_5: kuñjaro, supaṇṇamukhagato nāgarājā, rāhumukhappaviṭṭho cando, sapattaparivārito purisoti
anya-e0102n9:100_6: evamādayo tato tato muccitukāmā nissaritukāmāva honti, evaṁ tassa yogino cittaṁ sabbasmā
anya-e0102n9:100_7: saṅkhāragatā muccitukāmaṁ nissaritukāmaṁ hoti. Athassa evaṁ sabbasaṅkhāresu vigatālayassa
anya-e0102n9:100_8: sabbasmā saṅkhāragatā muccitukāmassa uppajjati muñcitukamyatā ñāṇanti.
anya-e0102n9:103_0: 757. So evaṁ sabbabhavayonigatiṭṭhitinivāsagatehi sabhedakehi saṅkhārehi muccitukāmo
anya-e0102n9:103_1: sabbasmā saṅkhāragatā muccituṁ puna te evaṁ saṅkhāre paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇena tilakkhaṇaṁ
anya-e0102n9:104_0: So sabbasaṅkhāre anaccantikato, tāvakālikato, uppādavayaparicchinnato, palokato,
anya-e0102n9:104_1: calato, pabhaṅguto, addhuvato, vipariṇāmadhammato, assārakato, vibhavato, saṅkhatato,
anya-e0102n9:105_0: Abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanato, dukkhamato, dukkhavatthuto, rogato, gaṇḍato, sallato, aghato,
anya-e0102n9:105_1: ābādhato, ītito, upaddavato, bhayato, upasaggato, atāṇato, aleṇato, asaraṇato, ādīnavato,
anya-e0102n9:105_2: aghamūlato, vadhakato, sāsavato, mārāmisato, jātidhammato, jarādhammato, byādhidhammato,
anya-e0102n9:105_3: sokadhammato, paridevadhammato, upāyāsadhammato, saṁkilesikadhammatotiādīhi kāraṇehi dukkhāti passati.
anya-e0102n9:106: Ajaññato, duggandhato, jegucchato, paṭikkūlato, amaṇḍanārahato, virūpato, bībhacchatotiādīhi kāraṇehi dukkhalakkhaṇassa parivārabhūtato asubhato passati.
anya-e0102n9:107: Parato, rittato, tucchato, suññato, assāmikato, anissarato, avasavattitotiādīhi kāraṇehi anattato passati.
anya-e0102n9:108: 758. Evañhi passatānena tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā saṅkhārā pariggahitā nāma honti. Kasmā panāyamete evaṁ pariggaṇhātīti? Muñcanassa upāyasampādanatthaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:109_0: Tatrāyaṁ upamā – eko kira puriso ‘‘macche gahessāmī’’ti macchakhippaṁ gahetvā udake
anya-e0102n9:109_1: oḍḍāpesi so khippamukhena hatthaṁ otāretvā antoudake sappaṁ gīvāya gahetvā ‘‘maccho
anya-e0102n9:109_2: me gahito’’ti attamano ahosi. So ‘‘mahā vata mayā maccho laddho’’ti ukkhipitvā passanto
anya-e0102n9:109_3: sovatthikattayadassanena sappoti sañjānitvā bhīto ādīnavaṁ disvā gahaṇe nibbinno
anya-e0102n9:109_4: muñcitukāmo hutvā muñcanassa upāyaṁ karonto agganaṅguṭṭhato paṭṭhāya hatthaṁ nibbeṭhetvā
anya-e0102n9:109_5: bāhuṁ ukkhipitvā uparisīse dve tayo vāre āvijjhitvā sappaṁ dubbalaṁ katvā ‘‘gaccha
anya-e0102n9:109_6: duṭṭha sappā’’ti nissajjitvā vegena taḷākapāḷiṁ āruyha ‘‘mahantassa vata bho sappassa
anya-e0102n9:110_0: Tattha tassa purisassa ‘‘maccho’’ti sappaṁ gīvāya gahetvā tuṭṭhakālo viya imassāpi
anya-e0102n9:110_1: yogino āditova attabhāvaṁ paṭilabhitvā tuṭṭhakālo, tassa khippamukhato sīsaṁ nīharitvā
anya-e0102n9:110_2: sovatthikattayadassanaṁ viya imassa ghanavinibbhogaṁ katvā saṅkhāresu tilakkhaṇadassanaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:110_3: tassa bhītakālo viya imassa bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṁ. Tato ādīnavadassanaṁ viya ādīnavānupassanāñāṇaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:110_4: gahaṇe nibbindanaṁ viya nibbidānupassanāñāṇaṁ. Sappaṁ muñcitukāmatā viya muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:110_5: muñcanassa upāyakaraṇaṁ viya paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇena saṅkhāresu tilakkhaṇāropanaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:110_6: Yathā hi so puriso sappaṁ āvijjhitvā dubbalaṁ katvā nivattetvā ḍaṁsituṁ asamatthabhāvaṁ
anya-e0102n9:110_7: pāpetvā sumuttaṁ muñcati, evamayaṁ yogāvacaro tilakkhaṇāropanena saṅkhāre āvijjhitvā
anya-e0102n9:110_8: dubbale katvā puna niccasukhasubhaattākārena upaṭṭhātuṁ asamatthataṁ pāpetvā sumuttaṁ
anya-e0102n9:110_9: muñcati. Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘muñcanassa upāyasampādanatthaṁ evaṁ pariggaṇhātī’’ti.
anya-e0102n9:111: 759. Ettāvatā tassa uppannaṁ hoti paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṁ. Yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ –
anya-e0102n9:112_0: ‘‘Aniccato manasikaroto kiṁ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṁ uppajjati? Dukkhato. Anattato manasikaroto
anya-e0102n9:112_1: kiṁ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṁ uppajjati? Aniccato manasikaroto nimittaṁ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṁ uppajjati.
anya-e0102n9:112_2: Dukkhato manasikaroto pavattaṁ paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṁ uppajjati. Anattato manasikaroto
anya-e0102n9:112_3: nimittañca pavattañca paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇaṁ uppajjatī’’ti (paṭi. ma. 1.227).
anya-e0102n9:113_0: Ettha ca nimittaṁ paṭisaṅkhāti saṅkhāranimittaṁ ‘‘addhuvaṁ tāvakālika’’nti aniccalakkhaṇavasena
anya-e0102n9:113_1: jānitvā. Kāmañca na paṭhamaṁ jānitvā pacchā ñāṇaṁ uppajjati, vohāravasena pana ‘‘manañca
anya-e0102n9:113_2: paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇa’’ntiādīni (ma. ni. 3.421) viya evaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0102n9:113_3: Ekattanayena vā purimañca pacchimañca ekaṁ katvā evaṁ vuttanti veditabbaṁ. Iminā
anya-e0102n9:116_0: 760. So evaṁ paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇena ‘‘sabbe saṅkhārā suññā’’ti pariggahetvā puna
anya-e0102n9:116_1: ‘‘suññamidaṁ attena vā attaniyena vā’’ti (ma. ni. 3.69) dvikoṭikaṁ suññataṁ pariggaṇhāti.
anya-e0102n9:116_2: So evaṁ neva attānaṁ, na paraṁ kiñci attano parikkhārabhāve ṭhitaṁ disvā puna ‘‘nāhaṁ
anya-e0102n9:116_3: kvacani, kassaci kiñcanatasmiṁ, na ca mama kvacani, kismiñci kiñcanatatthī’’ti yā
anya-e0102n9:116_4: ettha catukoṭikā suññatā kathitā, taṁ pariggaṇhāti.
anya-e0102n9:117_0: Kathaṁ? Ayañhi nāhaṁ kvacanīti kvaci attānaṁ na passati. Kassaci kiñcanatasminti
anya-e0102n9:117_1: attano attānaṁ kassaci parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṁ na passati. Bhātiṭṭhānevā
anya-e0102n9:117_2: bhātaraṁ, sahāyaṭṭhāne vā sahāyaṁ, parikkhāraṭṭhāne vā parikkhāraṁ maññitvā upanetabbaṁ
anya-e0102n9:117_3: na passatīti attho. Na ca mama kvacanīti ettha mama-saddaṁ tāva ṭhapetvā na ca kvacanīti
anya-e0102n9:117_4: parassa ca attānaṁ kvaci napassatīti ayamattho. Idāni mama-saddaṁ āharitvā mama kismiñci
anya-e0102n9:117_5: kiñcanatatthīti so parassa attā mama kismiñci kiñcanabhāve atthīti na passatīti.
anya-e0102n9:117_6: Attano bhātiṭṭhāne vā bhātaraṁ, sahāyaṭṭhāne vā sahāyaṁ parikkhāraṭṭhāne vā parikkhāranti
anya-e0102n9:117_7: kismiñci ṭhāne parassa attānaṁ iminā kiñcanabhāvena upanetabbaṁ na passatīti attho.
anya-e0102n9:117_8: Evamayaṁ yasmā neva katthaci attānaṁ passati, na taṁ parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṁ
anya-e0102n9:117_9: passati, na parassa attānaṁ passati, na parassa attānaṁ attano kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṁ
anya-e0102n9:117_10: passati. Tasmānena catukoṭikā suññatā pariggahitā hotīti.
anya-e0102n9:118_0: 761. Evaṁ catukoṭikaṁ suññataṁ pariggahetvā puna chahākārehi suññataṁ pariggaṇhāti.
anya-e0102n9:118_1: Kathaṁ? Cakkhu suññaṁ attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā
anya-e0102n9:118_2: avipariṇāmadhammena vā…pe… mano suñño. Rūpā suññā…pe… dhammā suññā. Cakkhuviññāṇaṁ…pe…
anya-e0102n9:118_3: manoviññāṇaṁ. Cakkhusamphassoti evaṁ yāva jarāmaraṇā nayo netabbo.
anya-e0102n9:119_0: 762. Evaṁ chahākārehi suññataṁ pariggahetvā puna aṭṭhahākārehi pariggaṇhāti. Seyyathidaṁ
anya-e0102n9:119_1: – rūpaṁ asāraṁ nissāraṁ sārāpagataṁ niccasārasārena vā dhuvasārasārena vā sukhasārasārena
anya-e0102n9:119_2: vā attasārasārena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā. Vedanā…
anya-e0102n9:119_3: saññā… saṅkhārā… viññāṇaṁ… cakkhu…pe… jarāmaraṇaṁ asāraṁ nissāraṁ sārāpagataṁ niccasārasārena
anya-e0102n9:119_4: vā dhuvasārasārena vā sukhasārasārena vā attasārasārena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā
anya-e0102n9:119_5: sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā. Yathā naḷo asāro nissāro sārāpagato. Yathā eraṇḍo…
anya-e0102n9:119_6: yathā udumbaro… yathā setavaccho… yathā pāḷibhaddako… yathā pheṇapiṇḍo… yathā udakabubbuḷaṁ…
anya-e0102n9:119_7: yathā marīci… yathā kadalikkhandho… yathā māyā asārā nissārā sārāpagatā, evameva
anya-e0102n9:119_8: rūpaṁ…pe… jarāmaraṇaṁ asāraṁ nissāraṁ sārāpagataṁ niccasārasārena vā…pe… avipariṇāmadhammena
anya-e0102n9:120_0: 763. So evaṁ aṭṭhahākārehi suññataṁ pariggahetvā puna dasahākārehi pariggaṇhāti,
anya-e0102n9:120_1: rūpaṁ rittato passati. Tucchato… suññato… anattato… anissariyato… akāmakāriyato…
anya-e0102n9:120_2: alabbhanīyato… avasavattakato… parato… vivittato passati. Vedanaṁ…pe… viññāṇaṁ rittato…pe…
anya-e0102n9:121_0: 764. Evaṁ dasahākārehi suññataṁ pariggahetvā puna dvādasahākārehi pariggaṇhāti. Seyyathidaṁ
anya-e0102n9:121_1: – rūpaṁ na satto, na jīvo, na naro, na māṇavo, na itthī, na puriso, na attā, na attaniyaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:121_2: Nāhaṁ, na mama, na aññassa, na kassaci. Vedanā…pe… viññāṇaṁ na kassacīti (cūḷani.
anya-e0102n9:122_0: 765. Evaṁ dvādasahākārehi suññataṁ pariggaṇhitvā puna tīraṇapariññāvasena dvācattālīsāya
anya-e0102n9:122_1: ākārehi suññataṁ pariggaṇhāti, rūpaṁ aniccato… dukkhato… rogato… gaṇḍato… sallato…
anya-e0102n9:122_2: aghato… ābādhato… parato… palokato… ītito… upaddavato… bhayato… upasaggato… calato…
anya-e0102n9:122_3: pabhaṅguto… addhuvato… atāṇato… aleṇato… asaraṇato… asaraṇībhūtato… rittato… tucchato…
anya-e0102n9:122_4: suññato… anattato… anassādato… ādīnavato… vipariṇāmadhammato… assārakato… aghamūlato…
anya-e0102n9:122_5: vadhakato… vibhavato… sāsavato… saṅkhatato… mārāmisato… jātidhammato… jarādhammato…
anya-e0102n9:122_7: atthaṅgamato… anassādato … ādīnavato… nissaraṇato passati. Vedanaṁ…pe… viññāṇaṁ aniccato…pe…
anya-e0102n9:123: Vuttampi cetaṁ – ‘‘rūpaṁ aniccato…pe… nissaraṇato passanto suññato lokaṁ avekkhati. Vedanaṁ…pe… viññāṇaṁ aniccato…pe… nissaraṇato passanto suññato lokaṁ avekkhati’’.
anya-e0102n9:126: Evaṁ lokaṁ avekkhantaṁ, maccurājā na passatī’’ti. (su. ni. 1125; cūḷani. mogharājamāṇavapucchāniddesa 88);
anya-e0102n9:127_0: 766. Evaṁ suññato disvā tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā saṅkhāre pariggaṇhanto bhayañca nandiñca
anya-e0102n9:127_1: vippahāya saṅkhāresu udāsīno ahosi majjhatto, ahanti vā mamanti vā na gaṇhāti vissaṭṭhabhariyo viya puriso.
anya-e0102n9:128_0: Yathā nāma purisassa bhariyā bhaveyya iṭṭhā kantā manāpā, so tāya vinā muhuttampi
anya-e0102n9:128_1: adhivāsetuṁ na sakkuṇeyya, ativiya naṁ mamāyeyya, so taṁ itthiṁ aññena purisena saddhiṁ
anya-e0102n9:128_2: ṭhitaṁ vā nisinnaṁ vā kathentiṁ vā hasantiṁ vā disvā kupito assa anattamano, adhimattaṁ
anya-e0102n9:128_3: domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeyya. So aparena samayena tassā itthiyā dosaṁ disvā muñcitukāmo
anya-e0102n9:128_4: hutvā taṁ vissajjeyya, na naṁ mamāti gaṇheyya. Tato paṭṭhāya taṁ yenakenaci saddhiṁ
anya-e0102n9:128_5: yaṁkiñci kurumānaṁ disvāpi neva kuppeyya, na domanassaṁ āpajjeyya, aññadatthu udāsīnova
anya-e0102n9:128_6: bhaveyya majjhatto. Evamevāyaṁ sabbasaṅkhārehi muñcitukāmo hutvā paṭisaṅkhānupassanāya
anya-e0102n9:128_7: saṅkhāre pariggaṇhanto ahaṁ mamāti gahetabbaṁ adisvā bhayañca nandiñca vippahāya
anya-e0102n9:129_0: Tassa evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato tīsu bhavesu catūsu yonīsu pañcasu gatīsu sattasu
anya-e0102n9:129_1: viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu navasu sattāvāsesu cittaṁ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati,
anya-e0102n9:130_0: Seyyathāpi nāma padumapalāse īsakapoṇe udakaphusitāni patilīyanti patikuṭanti pativattanti
anya-e0102n9:130_1: na sampasāriyanti, evameva…pe… seyyathāpi nāma kukkuṭapattaṁ vā nahārudaddulaṁ vā
anya-e0102n9:130_2: aggimhi pakkhittaṁ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati (a. ni. 7.49),
anya-e0102n9:130_3: evameva tassa tīsu bhavesu cittaṁ…pe… upekkhā vā pāṭikulyatā vā saṇṭhāti. Iccassa
anya-e0102n9:131_0: 767. Taṁ panetaṁ sace santipadaṁ nibbānaṁ santato passati, sabbaṁ saṅkhārappavattaṁ
anya-e0102n9:131_1: vissajjetvā nibbānameva pakkhandati. No ce nibbānaṁ santato passati, punappunaṁ saṅkhārārammaṇameva
anya-e0102n9:131_2: hutvā pavattati sāmuddikānaṁ disākāko viya. Sāmuddikā kira vāṇijakā nāvaṁ ārohantā
anya-e0102n9:131_3: disākākaṁ nāma gaṇhanti, te yadā nāvā vātakkhittā videsaṁ pakkhandati, tīraṁ na paññāyati,
anya-e0102n9:131_4: tadā disākākaṁ vissajjenti. So kūpakayaṭṭhito ākāsaṁ laṅghitvā sabbā disā ca vidisā
anya-e0102n9:131_5: ca anugantvā sace tīraṁ passati, tadabhimukhova gacchati. No ce passati, punappunaṁ
anya-e0102n9:131_6: āgantvā kūpakayaṭṭhiṁyeva allīyati. Evameva sace saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṁ santipadaṁ nibbānaṁ
anya-e0102n9:131_7: santato passati, sabbaṁ saṅkhārappavattaṁ vissajjetvā nibbānameva pakkhandati. No
anya-e0102n9:131_8: ce passati, punappunaṁ saṅkhārārammaṇameva hutvā pavattati.
anya-e0102n9:132_0: Tadidaṁ suppagge piṭṭhaṁ vaṭṭayamānaṁ viya. Nibbaṭṭitakappāsaṁ vihanamānaṁ viya nānappakārato
anya-e0102n9:132_1: saṅkhāre pariggahetvā bhayañca nandiñca pahāya saṅkhāravicinane majjhattaṁ hutvā
anya-e0102n9:132_2: tividhānupassanāvasena tiṭṭhati. Evaṁ tiṭṭhamānaṁ tividhavimokkhamukhabhāvaṁ āpajjitvā
anya-e0102n9:133_0: 768. Tatridaṁ tividhānupassanāvasena pavattanato tiṇṇaṁ indriyānaṁ ādhipateyyavasena
anya-e0102n9:133_1: tividhavimokkhamukhabhāvaṁ āpajjati nāma. Tisso hi anupassanā tīṇi vimokkhamukhānīti vuccanti. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n9:134_0: ‘‘Tīṇi kho panimāni vimokkhamukhāni lokaniyyānāya saṁvattanti, sabbasaṅkhāre paricchedaparivaṭumato
anya-e0102n9:134_1: samanupassanatāya, animittāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya, sabbasaṅkhāresu
anya-e0102n9:134_2: manosamuttejanatāya, appaṇihitāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya, sabbadhamme
anya-e0102n9:134_3: parato samanupassanatāya, suññatāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya, imāni tīṇi
anya-e0102n9:135_0: Tattha paricchedaparivaṭumatoti udayabbayavasena paricchedato ceva parivaṭumato ca.
anya-e0102n9:135_1: Aniccānupassanaṁ hi ‘‘udayato pubbe saṅkhārā natthī’’ti paricchinditvā tesaṁ gatiṁ
anya-e0102n9:135_2: samannesamānaṁ ‘‘vayato paraṁ na gacchanti, ettheva antaradhāyantī’’ti parivaṭumato
anya-e0102n9:135_3: samanupassati. Manosamuttejanatāyāti cittasaṁvejanatāya . Dukkhānupassanena hi saṅkhāresu
anya-e0102n9:135_4: cittaṁ saṁvejeti. Parato samanupassanatāyāti ‘‘nāhaṁ, na mamā’’ti evaṁ anattato samanupassanatāya.
anya-e0102n9:135_5: Iti imāni tīṇi padāni aniccānupassanādīnaṁ vasena vuttānīti veditabbāni. Teneva tadanantare
anya-e0102n9:135_6: pañhavissajjane vuttaṁ – ‘‘aniccato manasikaroto khayato saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahanti. Dukkhato
anya-e0102n9:135_7: manasikaroto bhayato saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahanti. Anattato manasikaroto suññato saṅkhārā
anya-e0102n9:136_0: 769. Katame pana te vimokkhā, yesaṁ imāni anupassanāni mukhānīti? Animitto, appaṇihito,
anya-e0102n9:136_1: suññatoti ete tayo. Vuttaṁ hetaṁ ‘‘aniccato manasikaronto adhimokkhabahulo animittaṁ
anya-e0102n9:136_2: vimokkhaṁ paṭilabhati. Dukkhato manasikaronto passaddhibahulo appaṇihitaṁ vimokkhaṁ
anya-e0102n9:136_3: paṭilabhati. Anattato manasikaronto vedabahulo suññatavimokkhaṁ paṭilabhatī’’ti (paṭi. ma. 1.223).
anya-e0102n9:137_0: Ettha ca animitto vimokkhoti animittākārena nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā pavatto ariyamaggo.
anya-e0102n9:137_1: So hi animittāya dhātuyā uppannattā animitto. Kilesehi ca vimuttattā vimokkho. Eteneva
anya-e0102n9:137_2: nayena appaṇihitākārena nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā pavatto appaṇihito. Suññatākārena
anya-e0102n9:137_3: nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā pavatto suññatoti veditabbo.
anya-e0102n9:138_0: 770. Yaṁ pana abhidhamme ‘‘yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ
anya-e0102n9:138_1: diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ
anya-e0102n9:138_2: upasampajja viharati appaṇihitaṁ suññata’’nti (dha. sa. 343 ādayo) evaṁ vimokkhadvayameva
anya-e0102n9:138_3: vuttaṁ, taṁ nippariyāyato vipassanāgamanaṁ sandhāya. Vipassanāñāṇaṁ hi kiñcāpi paṭisambhidāmagge –
anya-e0102n9:139_0: ‘‘Aniccānupassanāñāṇaṁ niccato abhinivesaṁ muñcatīti suññato vimokkho. Dukkhānupassanāñāṇaṁ
anya-e0102n9:139_1: sukhato abhinivesaṁ. Anattānupassanāñāṇaṁ attato abhinivesaṁ muñcatīti suññato vimokkho’’ti
anya-e0102n9:139_2: (paṭi. ma. 1.229) evaṁ abhinivesaṁ muñcanavasena suññato vimokkhoti ca,
anya-e0102n9:140_0: ‘‘Aniccānupassanāñāṇaṁ niccato nimittaṁ muñcatīti animitto vimokkho. Dukkhānupassanāñāṇaṁ
anya-e0102n9:140_1: sukhato nimittaṁ, anattānupassanāñāṇaṁ attato nimittaṁ muñcatīti animitto vimokkho’’ti
anya-e0102n9:140_2: (paṭi. ma. 1.229) evaṁ nimittaṁ muñcanavasena animitto vimokkhoti ca,
anya-e0102n9:141_0: ‘‘Aniccānupassanāñāṇaṁ niccato paṇidhiṁ muñcatīti appaṇihito vimokkho. Dukkhānupassanāñāṇaṁ
anya-e0102n9:141_1: sukhato paṇidhiṁ. Anattānupassanāñāṇaṁ attato paṇidhiṁ muñcatīti appaṇihito vimokkho’’ti
anya-e0102n9:141_2: (paṭi. ma. 1.229) evaṁ paṇidhiṁ muñcanavasena appaṇihito vimokkhoti ca –
anya-e0102n9:142_0: Vuttaṁ. Tathāpi taṁ saṅkhāranimittassa avijahanato na nippariyāyena animittaṁ. Nippariyāyena
anya-e0102n9:142_1: pana suññatañceva appaṇihitañca. Tassa ca āgamanavasena ariyamaggakkhaṇe vimokkho
anya-e0102n9:142_2: uddhaṭo. Tasmā appaṇihitaṁ suññatanti vimokkhadvayameva vuttanti veditabbaṁ. Ayaṁ
anya-e0102n9:143_0: 771. Yaṁ pana vuttaṁ ‘‘sattaariyapuggalavibhāgāya paccayo hotī’’ti, tattha saddhānusārī,
anya-e0102n9:143_1: saddhāvimutto, kāyasakkhi, ubhatobhāgavimutto, dhammānusārī, diṭṭhippatto, paññāvimuttoti
anya-e0102n9:143_2: ime tāva satta ariyapuggalā, tesaṁ vibhāgāya idaṁ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṁ paccayo hoti.
anya-e0102n9:144: 772. Yo hi aniccato manasikaronto adhimokkhabahulo saddhindriyaṁ paṭilabhati, so sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī hoti. Sesesu sattasu ṭhānesu saddhāvimutto.
anya-e0102n9:145_0: 773. Yo pana dukkhato manasikaronto passaddhibahulo samādhindriyaṁ paṭilabhati, so
anya-e0102n9:145_1: sabbattha kāyasakkhi nāma hoti. Arūpajjhānaṁ pana patvā aggaphalappatto ubhatobhāgavimutto nāma hoti.
anya-e0102n9:146: 774. Yo pana anattato manasikaronto vedabahulo paññindriyaṁ paṭilabhati, so sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe dhammānusārī hoti. Chasu ṭhānesu diṭṭhippatto aggaphale paññāvimuttoti.
anya-e0102n9:148: ‘‘Aniccato manasikaroto saddhindriyaṁ adhimattaṁ hoti. Saddhindriyassa adhimattattā sotāpattimaggaṁ paṭilabhati, tena vuccati saddhānusārī’’ti.
anya-e0102n9:149: Tathā ‘‘aniccato manasikaroto saddhindriyaṁ adhimattaṁ hoti, saddhindriyassa adhimattattā sotāpattiphalaṁ sacchikataṁ hoti, tena vuccati saddhāvimutto’’tiādi (paṭi. ma. 1.221).
anya-e0102n9:151_0: ‘‘Saddahanto vimuttoti saddhāvimutto. Phuṭṭhantaṁ sacchikatoti kāyasakkhi. Diṭṭhantaṁ
anya-e0102n9:151_1: pattoti diṭṭhippatto. Saddahanto vimuccatīti saddhāvimutto. Jhānaphassaṁ paṭhamaṁ
anya-e0102n9:151_2: phusati pacchā nirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ sacchikarotīti kāyasakkhi. ‘Dukkhā saṅkhārā, sukho
anya-e0102n9:151_3: nirodho’ti ñātaṁ hoti diṭṭhaṁ viditaṁ sacchikataṁ phusitaṁ paññāyāti diṭṭhippatto’’ti (paṭi. ma. 1.221).
anya-e0102n9:152_0: 777. Itaresu pana catūsu saddhaṁ anusarati, saddhāya vā anusarati gacchatīti saddhānusārī.
anya-e0102n9:152_1: Tathā paññāsaṅkhātaṁ dhammaṁ anusarati, dhammena vā anusaratīti dhammānusārī. Arūpajjhānena
anya-e0102n9:152_2: ceva ariyamaggena cāti ubhatobhāgena vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto. Pajānanto vimuttoti
anya-e0102n9:154_0: 778. Taṁ panetaṁ purimena ñāṇadvayena atthato ekaṁ. Tenāhu porāṇā – ‘‘idaṁ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṁ
anya-e0102n9:154_1: ekameva tīṇi nāmāni labhati, heṭṭhā muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṁ nāma jātaṁ, majjhe paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṁ
anya-e0102n9:154_2: nāma, ante ca sikhāppattaṁ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṁ nāma’’.
anya-e0102n9:156_3: ñāṇaṁ. Uppādo dukkhanti…pe… bhayanti…pe… sāmisanti…pe… uppādo saṅkhārāti…pe… upāyāso
anya-e0102n9:156_4: saṅkhārāti muñcitukamyatā-paṭisaṅkhā-santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇa’’nti (paṭi. ma. 1.54).
anya-e0102n9:157_0: 780. Tattha muñcitukamyatā ca sā paṭisaṅkhā ca santiṭṭhanā cāti muñcitukamyatā-paṭisaṅkhā-santiṭṭhanā.
anya-e0102n9:157_1: Iti pubbabhāge nibbidāñāṇena nibbinnassa uppādādīni pariccajitukāmatā muñcitukāmatā.
anya-e0102n9:157_2: Muñcanassa upāyakaraṇatthaṁ majjhe paṭisaṅkhānaṁ paṭisaṅkhā. Muñcitvā avasāne ajjhupekkhanaṁ
anya-e0102n9:157_3: santiṭṭhanā. Yaṁ sandhāya ‘‘uppādo saṅkhārā, te saṅkhāre ajjhupekkhatīti saṅkhārupekkhā’’tiādi
anya-e0102n9:158_0: 781. Apica imāyapi pāḷiyā idaṁ ekamevāti veditabbaṁ. Vuttaṁ hetaṁ – ‘‘yā ca muñcitukamyatā,
anya-e0102n9:158_1: yā ca paṭisaṅkhānupassanā, yā ca saṅkhārupekkhā, ime dhammā ekatthā, byañjanameva
anya-e0102n9:159_0: 782. Evaṁ adhigatasaṅkhārupekkhassa pana imassa kulaputtassa vipassanā sikhāppattā
anya-e0102n9:159_1: vuṭṭhānagāminī hoti. Sikhāppattā vipassanāti vā vuṭṭhānagāminīti vā saṅkhārupekkhādiñāṇattayasseva
anya-e0102n9:159_2: etaṁ nāmaṁ. Sā hi sikhaṁ uttamabhāvaṁ pattattā sikhāppattā. Vuṭṭhānaṁ gacchatīti
anya-e0102n9:159_3: vuṭṭhānagāminī. Vuṭṭhānaṁ vuccati bahiddhānimittabhūtato abhiniviṭṭhavatthuto ceva
anya-e0102n9:159_4: ajjhattapavattato ca vuṭṭhahanato maggo, taṁ gacchatīti vuṭṭhānagāminī, maggena saddhiṁ ghaṭiyatīti attho.
anya-e0102n9:160_0: 783. Tatrāyaṁ abhinivesavuṭṭhānānaṁ āvibhāvatthāya mātikā – ajjhattaṁ abhinivisitvā
anya-e0102n9:160_1: ajjhattā vuṭṭhāti, ajjhattaṁ abhinivisitvā bahiddhā vuṭṭhāti , bahiddhā abhinivisitvā
anya-e0102n9:160_2: bahiddhā vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā abhinivisitvā ajjhattā vuṭṭhāti, rūpe abhinivisitvā rūpā
anya-e0102n9:160_3: vuṭṭhāti, rūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā vuṭṭhāti, arūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā vuṭṭhāti,

anya-e0102n9:161_0: 784. Kathaṁ? Idhekacco āditova ajjhattasaṅkhāresu abhinivisati, abhinivisitvā te
anya-e0102n9:161_1: passati. Yasmā pana na suddhaajjhattadassanamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṁ hoti, bahiddhāpi
anya-e0102n9:161_2: daṭṭhabbameva, tasmā parassa khandhepi anupādiṇṇasaṅkhārepi aniccaṁ dukkhamanattāti
anya-e0102n9:161_3: passati. So kālena ajjhattaṁ sammasati, kālena bahiddhā. Tassevaṁ sammasato ajjhattaṁ

anya-e0102n9:162_1: abhinivisitvā bahiddhā vuṭṭhāti nāma. Esa nayo bahiddhā abhinivisitvā bahiddhā ca
anya-e0102n9:163_0: 785. Aparo āditova rūpe abhinivisati, abhinivisitvā bhūtarūpañca upādārūpañca rāsiṁ
anya-e0102n9:163_1: katvā passati. Yasmā pana na suddharūpadassanamatteneva vuṭṭhānaṁ hoti, arūpampi
anya-e0102n9:163_2: daṭṭhabbameva. Tasmā taṁ rūpaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā uppannaṁ vedanaṁ saññaṁ saṅkhāre viññāṇañca
anya-e0102n9:163_3: ‘‘idaṁ arūpa’’nti arūpaṁ passati. So kālena rūpaṁ sammasati, kālena arūpaṁ . Tassevaṁ
anya-e0102n9:163_4: sammasato rūpasammasanakāle vipassanā maggena saddhiṁ ghaṭiyati, ayaṁ rūpe abhinivisitvā rūpā vuṭṭhāti nāma.
anya-e0102n9:164: Sace panassa arūpasammasanakāle vipassanā maggena saddhiṁ ghaṭiyati, ayaṁ arūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā vuṭṭhāti nāma. Esa nayo arūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā ca rūpā ca vuṭṭhānepi.
anya-e0102n9:165: 786. ‘‘Yaṁkiñci samudayadhammaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ nirodhadhamma’’nti (dī. ni. 1.298) evaṁ abhinivisitvā evameva vuṭṭhānakāle pana ekappahārena pañcahi khandhehi vuṭṭhāti nāma.
anya-e0102n9:166_0: 787. Eko āditova aniccato saṅkhāre sammasati. Yasmā pana na aniccato sammasanamatteneva
anya-e0102n9:166_1: vuṭṭhānaṁ hoti, dukkhatopi anattatopi sammasitabbameva, tasmā dukkhatopi anattatopi
anya-e0102n9:166_2: sammasati. Tassevaṁ paṭipannassa aniccato sammasanakāle vuṭṭhānaṁ hoti, ayaṁ aniccato
anya-e0102n9:167_0: Sace panassa dukkhato anattato sammasanakāle vuṭṭhānaṁ hoti, ayaṁ aniccato abhinivisitvā
anya-e0102n9:167_1: dukkhato, anattato vuṭṭhāti nāma. Esa nayo dukkhato anattato abhinivisitvā sesavuṭṭhānesupi.
anya-e0102n9:168_0: 788. Ettha ca yopi aniccato abhiniviṭṭho, yopi dukkhato, yopi anattato, vuṭṭhānakāle
anya-e0102n9:168_1: ca aniccato vuṭṭhānaṁ hoti. Tayopi janā adhimokkhabahulā honti, saddhindriyaṁ paṭilabhanti,
anya-e0102n9:168_2: animittavimokkhena vimuccanti, paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārino honti, sattasu ṭhānesu
anya-e0102n9:168_3: saddhāvimuttā. Sace pana dukkhato vuṭṭhānaṁ hoti, tayopi janā passaddhibahulā honti,
anya-e0102n9:168_4: samādhindriyaṁ paṭilabhanti, appaṇihitavimokkhena vimuccanti, sabbattha kāyasakkhino
anya-e0102n9:168_5: honti. Yassa panettha arūpajjhānaṁ pādakaṁ, so aggaphale ubhatobhāgavimutto hoti.
anya-e0102n9:168_6: Atha nesaṁ anattato vuṭṭhānaṁ hoti, tayopi janā vedabahulā honti, paññindriyaṁ paṭilabhanti,
anya-e0102n9:168_7: suññatavimokkhena vimuccanti, paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe dhammānusārino honti, chasu ṭhānesu
anya-e0102n9:169: 789. Idāni saddhiṁ purimapacchimañāṇehi imissā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya āvibhāvatthaṁ dvādasa upamā veditabbā. Tāsaṁ idaṁ uddānaṁ –
anya-e0102n9:170: ‘‘Vaggulī kaṇhasappo ca, gharaṁ go yakkhi dārako;
anya-e0102n9:171: Khuddaṁ pipāsaṁ sītuṇhaṁ, andhakāraṁ visena cā’’ti.
anya-e0102n9:172_0: Imā ca upamā bhayatupaṭṭhānato pabhuti yattha katthaci ñāṇe ṭhatvā āharituṁ vaṭṭeyyuṁ.
anya-e0102n9:172_1: Imasmiṁ pana ṭhāne āhariyamānāsu bhayatupaṭṭhānato yāva phalañāṇaṁ sabbaṁ pākaṭaṁ
anya-e0102n9:173_0: 790.Vaggulīti ekā kira vaggulī ‘‘ettha pupphaṁ vā phalaṁ vā labhissāmī’’ti pañcasākhe
anya-e0102n9:173_1: madhukarukkhe nilīyitvā ekaṁ sākhaṁ parāmasitvā na tattha kiñci pupphaṁ phalaṁ vā
anya-e0102n9:173_2: gayhupagaṁ addasa. Yathā ca ekaṁ, evaṁ dutiyaṁ, tatiyaṁ, catutthaṁ. Pañcamampi sākhaṁ
anya-e0102n9:173_3: parāmasitvā nāddasa. Sā ‘‘aphalo vatāyaṁ rukkho, natthettha kiñci gayhupaga’’nti
anya-e0102n9:173_4: tasmiṁ rukkhe ālayaṁ vissajjetvā ujukāya sākhāya āruyha viṭapantarena sīsaṁ nīharitvā
anya-e0102n9:173_5: uddhaṁ ulloketvā ākāse uppatitvā aññasmiṁ phalarukkhe nilīyati.
anya-e0102n9:174_0: Tattha vagguli viya yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo, pañcasākho madhukarukkho viya pañcupādānakkhandhā,
anya-e0102n9:174_1: tattha vagguliyā nilīyanaṁ viya yogino khandhapañcake abhiniveso, tassā ekekaṁ sākhaṁ
anya-e0102n9:174_2: parāmasitvā kiñci gayhupagaṁ adisvā avasesasākhāparāmasanaṁ viya yogino rūpakkhandhaṁ
anya-e0102n9:174_3: sammasitvā tattha kiñci gayhupagaṁ adisvā avasesakkhandhasammasanaṁ, tassā ‘‘aphalo
anya-e0102n9:174_4: vatāyaṁ rukkho’’ti rukkhe ālayavissajjanaṁ viya yogino pañcasupi khandhesu aniccalakkhaṇādidassanavasena
anya-e0102n9:174_5: nibbinnassa muñcitukamyatādiñāṇattayaṁ, tassā ujukāya sākhāya upari ārohanaṁ viya
anya-e0102n9:174_6: yogino anulomaṁ, sīsaṁ nīharitvā uddhaṁ ullokanaṁ viya gotrabhuñāṇaṁ, ākāse uppatanaṁ
anya-e0102n9:174_7: viya maggañāṇaṁ, aññasmiṁ phalarukkhe nilīyanaṁ viya phalañāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:175_1: viya gotrabhuñāṇaṁ, muñcitvā āgatamaggaṁ olokentassa ṭhānaṁ viya maggañāṇaṁ, gantvā
anya-e0102n9:175_2: abhayaṭṭhāne ṭhānaṁ viya phalañāṇanti ayaṁ viseso.
anya-e0102n9:176_0: 792.Gharanti gharasāmike kira sāyaṁ bhuñjitvā sayanaṁ āruyha niddaṁ okkante gharaṁ
anya-e0102n9:176_1: ādittaṁ, so pabujjhitvā aggiṁ disvā ‘‘bhīto sādhu vatassa sace aḍayhamāno nikkhameyya’’nti
anya-e0102n9:176_2: olokayamāno maggaṁ disvā nikkhamitvā vegena khemaṭṭhānaṁ gantvā ṭhito. Tattha gharasāmikassa
anya-e0102n9:176_3: bhuñjitvā sayanaṁ āruyha niddokkamanaṁ viya bālaputhujjanassa khandhapañcake ‘‘ahaṁ
anya-e0102n9:176_4: mamā’’ti gahaṇaṁ. Pabujjhitvā aggiṁ disvā bhītakālo viya sammāpaṭipadaṁ paṭipajjitvā
anya-e0102n9:176_5: lakkhaṇaṁ disvā bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṁ, nikkhamanamaggaṁ olokanaṁ viya muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṁ
anya-e0102n9:176_6: , maggadassanaṁ viya anulomaṁ, nikkhamanaṁ viya gotrabhuñāṇaṁ, vegena gamanaṁ viya
anya-e0102n9:177_0: 793.Goti ekassa kira kassakassa rattibhāge niddaṁ okkantassa vajaṁ bhinditvā goṇā
anya-e0102n9:177_1: palātā, so paccūsasamaye tattha gantvā olokento tesaṁ palātabhāvaṁ ñatvā anupadaṁ
anya-e0102n9:177_2: gantvā rañño goṇe addasa. Te ‘‘mayhaṁ goṇā’’ti sallakkhetvā āharanto pabhātakāle
anya-e0102n9:177_3: ‘‘na ime mayhaṁ goṇā, rañño goṇā’’ti sañjānitvā ‘‘yāva maṁ ‘coro aya’nti gahetvā
anya-e0102n9:177_4: rājapurisā na anayabyasanaṁ pāpenti, tāvadeva palāyissāmī’’ti bhīto goṇe pahāya vegena
anya-e0102n9:177_5: palāyitvā nibbhayaṭṭhāne aṭṭhāsi. Tattha ‘‘mayhaṁ goṇā’’ti rājagoṇānaṁ gahaṇaṁ viya
anya-e0102n9:177_6: bālaputhujjanassa ‘‘ahaṁ mamā’’ti khandhānaṁ gahaṇaṁ, pabhāte ‘‘rājagoṇā’’ti sañjānanaṁ
anya-e0102n9:177_7: viya yogino tilakkhaṇavasena khandhānaṁ ‘‘aniccā dukkhā anattā’’ti sañjānanaṁ, bhītakālo
anya-e0102n9:177_8: viya bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṁ, vissajjitvā gantukāmatā viya muñcitukamyatā, vissajjanaṁ
anya-e0102n9:177_9: viya gotrabhu, palāyanaṁ viya maggo, palāyitvā abhayadese ṭhānaṁ viya phalaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:178_0: 794.Yakkhīti eko kira puriso yakkhiniyā saddhiṁ saṁvāsaṁ kappesi, sā rattibhāge ‘‘sutto
anya-e0102n9:178_1: aya’’nti mantvā āmakasusānaṁ gantvā manussamaṁsaṁ khādati. So ‘‘kuhiṁ esā gacchatī’’ti
anya-e0102n9:178_2: anubandhitvā manussamaṁsaṁ khādamānaṁ disvā tassā amanussibhāvaṁ ñatvā ‘‘yāva maṁ
anya-e0102n9:178_3: na khādati, tāva palāyissāmī’’ti bhīto vegena palāyitvā khemaṭṭhāne aṭṭhāsi. Tattha
anya-e0102n9:178_4: yakkhiniyā saddhiṁ saṁvāso viya khandhānaṁ ‘‘ahaṁ mamā’’ti gahaṇaṁ, susāne manussamaṁsaṁ
anya-e0102n9:178_5: khādamānaṁ disvā ‘‘yakkhinī aya’’nti jānanaṁ viya khandhānaṁ tilakkhaṇaṁ disvā aniccādibhāvajānanaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:178_6: bhītakālo viya bhayatupaṭṭhānaṁ, palāyitukāmatā viya muñcitukamyatā, susānavijahanaṁ
anya-e0102n9:178_7: viya gotrabhu, vegena palāyanaṁ viya maggo, abhayadese ṭhānaṁ viya phalaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:179_0: 795.Dārakoti ekā kira puttagiddhinī itthī, sā uparipāsāde nisinnāva antaravīthiyaṁ
anya-e0102n9:179_1: dārakasaddaṁ sutvā ‘‘putto nu kho me kenaci viheṭhiyatī’’ti vegasā gantvā ‘‘attano
anya-e0102n9:179_2: putto’’ti saññāya paraputtaṁ aggahesi. Sā ‘‘paraputto aya’’nti sañjānitvā ottappamānā
anya-e0102n9:179_3: ito cito ca oloketvā ‘‘mā heva maṁ koci ‘dārakacorī aya’nti vadeyyā’’ti dārakaṁ tattheva
anya-e0102n9:179_4: oropetvā puna vegasā pāsādaṁ āruyha nisīdi. Tattha attano puttasaññāya paraputtassa
anya-e0102n9:179_5: gahaṇaṁ viya ‘‘ahaṁ mamā’’ti pañcakkhandhagahaṇaṁ, ‘‘paraputto aya’’nti sañjānanaṁ
anya-e0102n9:179_6: viya tilakkhaṇavasena ‘‘nāhaṁ, na mamā’’ti sañjānanaṁ, ottappanaṁ viya bhayatupaṭṭhānaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:179_7: ito cito ca olokanaṁ viya muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṁ, tattheva dārakassa oropanaṁ viya anulomaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:179_8: oropetvā antaravīthiyaṁ ṭhitakālo viya gotrabhu, pāsādārūhanaṁ viya maggo, āruyha
anya-e0102n9:180_0: 796.Khuddaṁ pipāsaṁ sītuṇhaṁ, andhakāraṁ visena cāti imā pana cha upamā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā
anya-e0102n9:180_2: Yathā hi khuddāya abhibhūto sujighacchito puriso sādurasaṁ bhojanaṁ pattheti, evamevāyaṁ
anya-e0102n9:180_3: saṁsāravaṭṭajighacchāya phuṭṭho yogāvacaro amatarasaṁ kāyagatāsatibhojanaṁ pattheti.
anya-e0102n9:181: Yathā ca pipāsito puriso parisussamānakaṇṭhamukho anekaṅgasambhāraṁ pānakaṁ pattheti, evamevāyaṁ saṁsāravaṭṭapipāsāya phuṭṭho yogāvacaro ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikamaggapānakaṁ pattheti.
anya-e0102n9:182: Yathā pana sītasamphuṭṭho puriso uṇhaṁ pattheti, evamevāyaṁ saṁsāravaṭṭe taṇhāsinehasītena phuṭṭho yogāvacaro kilesasantāpakaṁ maggatejaṁ pattheti.
anya-e0102n9:183: Yathā ca uṇhasamphuṭṭho puriso sītaṁ pattheti, evamevāyaṁ saṁsāravaṭṭe ekādasaggisantāpasantatto yogāvacaro ekādasaggivūpasamaṁ nibbānaṁ pattheti.
anya-e0102n9:184: Yathā pana andhakārapareto puriso ālokaṁ pattheti, evamevāyaṁ avijjandhakārena onaddhapariyonaddho yogāvacaro ñāṇālokaṁ maggabhāvanaṁ pattheti.
anya-e0102n9:185_0: Yathā ca visasamphuṭṭho puriso visaghātanaṁ bhesajjaṁ pattheti, evamevāyaṁ kilesavisasamphuṭṭho
anya-e0102n9:185_1: yogāvacaro kilesavisanimmathanaṁ amatosadhaṁ nibbānaṁ pattheti. Tena vuttaṁ – ‘‘tassevaṁ
anya-e0102n9:185_2: jānato evaṁ passato tīsu bhavesu…pe… navasu sattāvāsesu cittaṁ patilīyati patikuṭati
anya-e0102n9:185_3: pativattati na sampasāriyati. Upekkhā vā pāṭikulyatā vā saṇṭhāti. Seyyathāpi nāma
anya-e0102n9:185_4: padumapalāse īsakapoṇe’’ti sabbaṁ pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:186: 797. Ettāvatā ca panesa patilīnacaro nāma hoti, yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ –
anya-e0102n9:190: Yo attānaṁ bhavane na dassaye’’ti. (su. ni. 816; mahāni. 45);
anya-e0102n9:191_0: Evamidaṁ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṁ yogino patilīnacarabhāvaṁ niyametvā uttari ariyamaggassāpi
anya-e0102n9:191_2: visesaṁ pādakajjhānaṁ niyametīti vadanti. Keci vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā
anya-e0102n9:191_3: niyamentīti vadanti. Keci puggalajjhāsayo niyametīti vadanti. Tesampi vādesu ayaṁ
anya-e0102n9:192_0: 798. Tatrāyaṁ anupubbikathā – vipassanāniyamena hi sukkhavipassakassa uppannamaggopi,
anya-e0102n9:192_1: samāpattilābhino jhānaṁ pādakaṁ akatvā uppannamaggopi, paṭhamajjhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā
anya-e0102n9:192_2: pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre sammasitvā uppāditamaggopi paṭhamajjhānikāva honti. Sabbesu satta
anya-e0102n9:192_3: bojjhaṅgāni aṭṭha maggaṅgāni pañca jhānaṅgāni honti. Tesaṁ hi pubbabhāgavipassanā
anya-e0102n9:192_4: somanassasahagatāpi upekkhāsahagatāpi hutvā vuṭṭhānakāle saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṁ patvā
anya-e0102n9:192_5: somanassasahagatā hoti. Pañcakanaye dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānāni pādakāni katvā uppāditamaggesu
anya-e0102n9:192_6: yathākkameneva jhānaṁ caturaṅgikaṁ tivaṅgikaṁ duvaṅgikañca hoti. Sabbesu pana satta
anya-e0102n9:192_7: maggaṅgāni honti. Catutthe cha bojjhaṅgāni. Ayaṁ viseso pādakajjhānaniyamena ceva
anya-e0102n9:192_8: vipassanāniyamena ca hoti. Tesampi hi pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatāpi upekkhāsahagatāpi
anya-e0102n9:192_9: hoti. Vuṭṭhānagāminī somanassasahagatāva. Pañcamajjhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā nibbattitamagge
anya-e0102n9:192_10: pana upekkhācittekaggatāvasena dve jhānaṅgāni bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgāni cha satta ceva.
anya-e0102n9:192_11: Ayampi viseso ubhayaniyamavasena hoti. Imasmiṁ hi naye pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatā
anya-e0102n9:192_12: vā upekkhāsahagatā vā hoti. Vuṭṭhānagāminī upekkhāsahagatāva. Arūpajjhānāni pādakaṁ
anya-e0102n9:192_13: katvā uppāditamaggepi eseva nayo. Evaṁ pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya yekeci saṅkhāre sammasitvā
anya-e0102n9:192_14: nibbattitamaggassa āsannapadese vuṭṭhitasamāpatti attano sadisabhāvaṁ karoti bhūmivaṇṇo viya godhāvaṇṇassa.
anya-e0102n9:193_0: 799. Dutiyattheravāde pana yato yato samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ye ye samāpattidhamme sammasitvā
anya-e0102n9:193_1: maggo nibbattito hoti, taṁtaṁsamāpattisadisova hoti. Tatrāpi ca vipassanāniyamo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0102n9:194_0: 800. Tatiyattheravāde attano attano ajjhāsayānurūpena yaṁ yaṁ jhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā
anya-e0102n9:194_1: ye ye jhānadhamme sammasitvā maggo nibbattito, taṁtaṁjhānasadisova hoti. Pādakajjhānaṁ
anya-e0102n9:194_2: pana sammasitajjhānaṁ vā vinā ajjhāsayamatteneva taṁ na ijjhati. Svāyamattho nandakovādasuttena
anya-e0102n9:194_3: (ma. ni. 3.398 ādayo) dīpetabbo. Etthāpi ca vipassanāniyamo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0102n9:194_4: Evaṁ tāva saṅkhārupekkhā bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgāni niyametīti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n9:195_0: 801. Sace panāyaṁ ādito kilese vikkhambhayamānā dukkhena sappayogena sasaṅkhārena
anya-e0102n9:195_1: vikkhambhetuṁ asakkhi, dukkhāpaṭipadā nāma hoti. Vipariyāyena sukhāpaṭipadā. Kilese
anya-e0102n9:195_2: pana vikkhambhetvā vipassanāparivāsaṁ maggapātubhāvaṁ saṇikaṁ kurumānā dandhābhiññā
anya-e0102n9:195_3: nāma hoti. Vipariyāyena khippābhiññā. Iti ayaṁ saṅkhārupekkhā āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā
anya-e0102n9:195_4: attano attano maggassa nāmaṁ deti. Tena maggo cattāri nāmāni labhati.
anya-e0102n9:196_0: Sā panāyaṁ paṭipadā kassaci bhikkhuno nānā hoti, kassaci catūsupi maggesu ekāva.
anya-e0102n9:196_1: Buddhānaṁ pana cattāropi maggā sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññāva ahesuṁ. Tathā dhammasenāpatissa.
anya-e0102n9:196_2: Mahāmoggallānattherassa pana paṭhamamaggo sukhāpaṭipado khippābhiñño ahosi. Upari
anya-e0102n9:196_3: tayo dukkhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññā. Yathā ca paṭipadā, evaṁ adhipatayopi kassaci bhikkhuno
anya-e0102n9:196_4: catūsu maggesu nānā honti. Kassaci catūsupi ekāva. Evaṁ saṅkhārupekkhā paṭipadāvisesaṁ
anya-e0102n9:196_5: niyameti. Yathā pana vimokkhavisesaṁ niyameti, taṁ pubbe vuttameva.
anya-e0102n9:197_0: 802. Apica maggo nāma pañcahi kāraṇehi nāmaṁ labhati sarasena vā paccanīkena vā saguṇena
anya-e0102n9:197_1: vā ārammaṇena vā āgamanena vā. Sace hi saṅkhārupekkhā aniccato saṅkhāre sammasitvā
anya-e0102n9:197_2: vuṭṭhāti, animittavimokkhena vimuccati. Sace dukkhato sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti, appaṇihitavimokkhena
anya-e0102n9:197_3: vimuccati. Sace anattato sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti, suññatavimokkhena vimuccati. Idaṁ sarasato nāmaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n9:198_0: Yasmā panesa aniccānupassanāya saṅkhārānaṁ ghanavinibbhogaṁ katvā niccanimittadhuvanimittasassatanimittāni
anya-e0102n9:198_1: pajahanto āgato, tasmā animitto. Dukkhānupassanāya pana sukhasaññaṁ pahāya paṇidhiṁ
anya-e0102n9:198_2: patthanaṁ sukkhāpetvā āgatattā appaṇihito. Anattānupassanāya attasattapuggalasaññaṁ
anya-e0102n9:198_3: pahāya saṅkhārānaṁ suññato diṭṭhattā suññatoti idaṁ paccanīkato nāmaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n9:199: Rāgādīhi panesa suññattā suññato, rūpanimittādīnaṁ rāganimittādīnaññeva vā abhāvena animitto, rāgapaṇidhiādīnaṁ abhāvato appaṇihitoti idamassa saguṇato nāmaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:200: Svāyaṁ suññaṁ animittaṁ appaṇihitañca nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ karotītipi suññato animitto appaṇihitoti vuccati. Idamassa ārammaṇato nāmaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:201_0: 803. Āgamanaṁ pana duvidhaṁ vipassanāgamanaṁ maggāgamanañca. Tattha magge vipassanāgamanaṁ
anya-e0102n9:201_1: labhati, phale maggāgamanaṁ. Anattānupassanā hi suññatā nāma, suññatavipassanāya
anya-e0102n9:201_2: maggo suññato, aniccānupassanā animittā nāma , animittavipassanāya maggo animitto.
anya-e0102n9:201_3: Idaṁ pana nāmaṁ na abhidhammapariyāyena labbhati, suttantapariyāyena labbhati. Tatra
anya-e0102n9:201_4: hi gotrabhuñāṇaṁ animittaṁ nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā animittanāmakaṁ hutvā sayaṁ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne
anya-e0102n9:201_5: ṭhatvā maggassa nāmaṁ detīti vadanti. Tena maggo animittoti vutto. Maggāgamanena
anya-e0102n9:201_6: pana phalaṁ animittanti yujjatiyeva. Dukkhānupassanā saṅkhāresu paṇidhiṁ sukkhāpetvā
anya-e0102n9:201_7: āgatattā appaṇihitā nāma, appaṇihitavipassanāya maggo appaṇihito, appaṇihitamaggassa
anya-e0102n9:201_8: phalaṁ appaṇihitaṁ. Evaṁ vipassanā attano nāmaṁ maggassa deti, maggo phalassāti idaṁ
anya-e0102n9:201_9: āgamanato nāmaṁ. Evamayaṁ saṅkhārupekkhā vimokkhavisesaṁ niyametīti.
anya-e0102n9:204_0: 804. Tassa taṁ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṁ āsevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa adhimokkhasaddhā
anya-e0102n9:204_1: balavatarā nibbattati, vīriyaṁ supaggahitaṁ hoti, sati sūpaṭṭhitā, cittaṁ susamāhitaṁ,
anya-e0102n9:204_2: tikkhatarā saṅkhārupekkhā uppajjati. Tassa ‘‘dāni maggo uppajjissatī’’ti saṅkhārupekkhā
anya-e0102n9:204_3: saṅkhāre aniccāti vā dukkhāti vā anattāti vā sammasitvā bhavaṅgaṁ otarati. Bhavaṅgānantaraṁ
anya-e0102n9:204_4: saṅkhārupekkhāya katanayeneva saṅkhāre aniccāti vā dukkhāti vā anattāti vā ārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0102n9:204_5: kurumānaṁ uppajjati manodvārāvajjanaṁ. Tato bhavaṅgaṁ āvaṭṭetvā uppannassa tassa
anya-e0102n9:204_6: kiriyacittassānantaraṁ avīcikaṁ cittasantatiṁ anuppabandhamānaṁ tatheva saṅkhāre
anya-e0102n9:204_7: ārammaṇaṁ katvā uppajjati paṭhamaṁ javanacittaṁ, yaṁ parikammanti vuccati. Tadanantaraṁ
anya-e0102n9:204_8: tatheva saṅkhāre ārammaṇaṁ katvā uppajjati dutiyaṁ javanacittaṁ, yaṁ upacāranti vuccati.
anya-e0102n9:204_9: Tadanantarampi tatheva saṅkhāre ārammaṇaṁ katvā uppajjati tatiyaṁ javanacittaṁ, yaṁ
anya-e0102n9:204_10: anulomanti vuccati. Idaṁ nesaṁ pāṭiyekkaṁ nāmaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:205_0: Avisesena pana tividhampetaṁ āsevanantipi parikammantipi upacārantipi anulomantipi
anya-e0102n9:205_1: vattuṁ vaṭṭati. Kissānulomaṁ? Purimabhāgapacchimabhāgānaṁ. Tañhi purimānaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ
anya-e0102n9:205_2: vipassanāñāṇānaṁ tathakiccatāya ca anulometi, upari ca sattatiṁsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:205_4: vata dhammānaṁ udayabbayañāṇaṁ uppādavaye addasā’’ti ca, ‘‘bhaṅgavantānaṁyeva vata
anya-e0102n9:205_5: bhaṅgānupassanaṁ bhaṅgaṁ addasā’’ti ca, ‘‘sabhayaṁyeva vata bhayatupaṭṭhānassa bhayato
anya-e0102n9:205_6: upaṭṭhita’’nti ca, ‘‘sādīnaveyeva vata ādīnavānupassanaṁ ādīnavaṁ addasā’’ti ca,
anya-e0102n9:205_8: muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṁ muñcitukāmaṁ jāta’’nti ca, ‘‘paṭisaṅkhātabbaṁyeva vata paṭisaṅkhāñāṇena
anya-e0102n9:205_9: paṭisaṅkhāta’’nti ca, ‘‘upekkhitabbaṁyeva vata saṅkhārupekkhāya upekkhita’’nti ca
anya-e0102n9:205_10: atthato vadamānaṁ viya imesañca aṭṭhannaṁ ñāṇānaṁ tathakiccatāya anulometi, upari
anya-e0102n9:205_11: ca sattatiṁsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṁ tāya paṭipattiyā pattabbattā.
anya-e0102n9:206_0: Yathā hi dhammiko rājā vinicchayaṭṭhāne nisinno vohārikamahāmattānaṁ vinicchayaṁ
anya-e0102n9:206_1: sutvā agatigamanaṁ pahāya majjhatto hutvā ‘‘evaṁ hotū’’ti anumodamāno tesañca vinicchayassa
anya-e0102n9:206_2: anulometi, porāṇassa ca rājadhammassa, evaṁsampadamidaṁ veditabbaṁ. Rājā viya hi
anya-e0102n9:206_3: anulomañāṇaṁ, aṭṭha vohārikamahāmattā viya aṭṭha ñāṇāni, porāṇo rājadhammo viya sattatiṁsa
anya-e0102n9:206_4: bodhipakkhiyā. Tattha yathā rājā ‘‘evaṁ hotū’’ti vadamāno vohārikānañca vinicchayassa,
anya-e0102n9:206_5: rājadhammassa ca anulometi, evamidaṁ aniccādivasena saṅkhāre ārabbha uppajjamānaṁ
anya-e0102n9:206_6: aṭṭhannañca ñāṇānaṁ tathakiccatāya anulometi, upari ca sattatiṁsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:209_0: 805. Idañca pana anulomañāṇaṁ saṅkhārārammaṇāya vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya pariyosānaṁ
anya-e0102n9:209_1: hoti. Sabbena sabbaṁ pana gotrabhuñāṇaṁ vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya pariyosānaṁ.
anya-e0102n9:209_2: Idāni tassāyeva vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya asammohatthaṁ ayaṁ suttasaṁsandanā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n9:211_1: nissāya atammayataṁ āgamma yāyaṁ upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā, taṁ pajahatha taṁ samatikkamathā’’ti
anya-e0102n9:212: Alagaddasuttante ‘‘nibbindaṁ virajjati, virāgā vimuccatī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.245) evaṁ nibbidāti vuttā.
anya-e0102n9:213: Susimasuttante ‘‘pubbe kho, susima, dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṁ, pacchā nibbāne ñāṇa’’nti (saṁ. ni. 2.70) evaṁ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti vuttā.
anya-e0102n9:214: Poṭṭhapādasuttante ‘‘saññā kho, poṭṭhapāda, paṭhamaṁ uppajjati, pacchā ñāṇa’’nti (dī. ni. 1.416) evaṁ saññagganti vuttā.
anya-e0102n9:215: Dasuttarasuttante ‘‘paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅga’’nti (dī. ni. 3.359) evaṁ pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅganti vuttā.
anya-e0102n9:216: Paṭisambhidāmagge ‘‘yā ca muñcitukamyatā yā ca paṭisaṅkhānupassanā yā ca saṅkhārupekkhā, ime dhammā ekatthā byañjanameva nāna’’nti (paṭi. ma. 1.227) evaṁ tīhi nāmehi vuttā.
anya-e0102n9:217: Paṭṭhāne ‘‘anulomaṁ gotrabhussa, anulomaṁ vodānassā’’ti (paṭṭhā. 1.1.417) evaṁ tīhi nāmehi vuttā.
anya-e0102n9:218: Rathavinītasuttante ‘‘kiṁ panāvuso, paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhatthaṁ bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussatī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.257) evaṁ paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhīti vuttā.
